content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The target structure consists of two separate constructions:

1. Left Structure:
   - 4 blocks in total
   - 3 layers (base, cylinder, top U-shape)

2. Right Structure:
   - 5 blocks in total
   - 3 layers (base cylinders, horizontal yellow blocks, triangular roof)

## Spatial Relationships

### Left Structure
- Bottom layer: A horizontal green rectangular block (base)
- Middle layer: An orange cylinder standing vertically on the green base
- Top layer: A green U-shaped structure consisting of three green blocks (two vertical blocks connected by a horizontal block) placed on top of the orange cylinder

### Right Structure
- Bottom layer: Two orange cylinders standing vertically side by side
- Middle layer: Two yellow horizontal rectangular blocks placed across the top of the cylinders, forming a T-shape
- Top layer: An orange triangular roof block placed on top of the taller cylinder

# Selection of Required Blocks

Based on the target image, I need to select the following blocks from the dictionary:

1. Green horizontal rectangular block (index 1) - for the base of the left structure
2. Green vertical rectangular blocks (indices 2, 3) - for the vertical parts of the U-shape
3. Green horizontal rectangular block (index 4) - for the horizontal part of the U-shape
4. Orange cylindrical blocks (index 12) - 3 required (1 for left structure, 2 for right structure)
5. Yellow horizontal rectangular blocks (indices 6, 7) - for the top of the right structure
6. Orange triangular roof block (index 14) - for the top of the right structure

# Assembly Order

```
{
  Step1: Move block with index 1
  Step2: Move block with index 12
  Step3: Move block with index 3
  Step4: Move block with index 2
  Step5: Move block with index 4
  Step6: Move block with index 12
  Step7: Move block with index 12
  Step8: Move block with index 6
  Step9: Move block with index 7
  Step10: Move block with index 14
}
```

This assembly sequence starts with the left structure from the bottom up, then proceeds to build the right structure from the bottom up.
